dwelling.name: Air Elemental Conflux
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit air elementals. Replenishes every week. Cannot be flagged by heroes

dwelling.name: Boar Glen
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit boars. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Crystal Cavern
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit crystal dragons. Replenishes every week. Guarded by few crystal dragons

dwelling.name: Earth Elemental Conflux
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit earth elementals. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a pack of earth elementals. Cannot be flagged by heroes

dwelling.name: Enchanter's Hollow
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit enchanters. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several enchanters

dwelling.name: Elemental Conflux
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit air, water, fire and earth elementals. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a pack of earth elementals. Cannot be flagged by heroes

dwelling.name: Fire Elemental Conflux
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit fire elementals. Replenishes every week. Cannot be flagged by heroes

dwelling.name: Frozen Cliffs
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit azure dragons. Replenishes every week. Guarded a few azure dragons

dwelling.name: Hovel
dwelling.description: Gives peasants to a visiting hero for free once per week

dwelling.name: Magic Forest
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit faerie dragons. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a few faerie dragons

dwelling.name: Nomad Tent
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit nomads. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Refugee Camp
dwelling.description: In this camp, heroes can recruit random creatures every week

dwelling.name: Rogue Cavern
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit rogues. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Sulfurous Lair
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit rust dragons. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a few rust dragons

dwelling.name: Thatched Hut
dwelling.description: Gives halflings to a visiting hero for free once per week

dwelling.name: Tomb of Curses
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit mummies. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Treetop Tower
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit sharpshooters. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Troll Bridge
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit trolls. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a several trolls

dwelling.name: War Machine Factory
dwelling.description: The factory allows heroes to buy war machines

dwelling.name: Water Elemental Conflux
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit water elementals. Replenishes every week. Cannot be flagged by heroes
